item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, April 25, 2024 at 1:50 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Europeans ‘less hard-working’ than Americans, says Norway oil fund boss
2. BHP proposes £31bn takeover of Anglo American in mining mega-deal
3. Zuckerberg defends Meta’s AI spending spree as shares tumble
4. Jefferies boss sells $65mn in stock to buy a customer’s yacht
5. Spanish PM considers quitting as wife faces corruption investigation
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, April 25, 2024 at 1:50 PM UTC
